response.overview: An anthology film presenting remakes of three episodes from the "Twilight Zone" TV series—"Kick the Can", "It's a Good Life" and "Nightmare at 20,000 Feet"—and one original story, "Time Out."
response.tagline: You're travelling through another dimension. A dimension, not only of sight and sound, but of mind. A journey into a wondrous land whose boundaries are that of imagination. Next stop, the Twilight Zone!
response.title: Twilight Zone: The Movie

titles.title: トワイライトゾーン／超次元の体験
トワイライトゾーン／超次元の体験：1983
